tool_description: Analyzes historical labor cost trends and patterns to inform future negotiations and identify cost drivers and seasonal variations.

historical_data_source.description: Source system or file containing historical cost data

analysis_period_years.description: Number of years of historical data to analyze (1-20)

cost_categories.description: Cost categories to analyze: wages, benefits, overtime, total

organization_unit.description: Organizational unit or department for analysis

trend_analysis_type.description: Type of trend analysis: linear, seasonal, cyclical

inflation_adjustment.description: Whether to adjust costs for inflation

error_messages: Data source unavailable: Cannot access the specified historical data source. Check system connectivity.
Invalid analysis period: Analysis period must be between 1 and 20 years.
Invalid cost categories: Cost categories must include at least one of: wages, benefits, overtime, total.
Invalid organization unit: The specified organizational unit does not exist in the data.
Invalid trend analysis type: Trend analysis type must be one of: linear, seasonal, cyclical.
Insufficient data: Not enough historical data available for the specified period and parameters.
usage: Provide historical_data_source, analysis_period_years, cost_categories, and organization_unit for trend analysis. Optionally specify trend_analysis_type and inflation_adjustment. Returns comprehensive historical analysis with trends and patterns.

annual_cost_trend.description: Annual cost values over the analysis period

cost_volatility.description: Measure of cost volatility over the period

trend_summary.description: Summary of key trends and findings
